data.title: Shadai Stallion Station
data.meta_description: MAURICE 産駒のご紹介。血統表・競走成績・種牡馬成績はこちら。社台スタリオンステーションは世界に通用する馬づくりを目標に種牡馬事業全般を行なっています。
data.text:
STUD RECORD

Maurice entered stud in Japan in 2017.

He shuttled to Arrowfield Stud in Australia for the Southern Hemisphere breeding season in 2017, 2018, 2019, 2021, 2022, and 2023.

In 2023, Jack d'Or became the third Grade 1 winner for his sire in Japan when he won the Grade 1 Osaka Hai. Additionally, North Bridge captured the Grade 2 American Jockey Club Cup, Divina took the Grade 2 Fuchu Himba Stakes, Strauss won the Grade 2 Tokyo Sports Hai Nisai Stakes, and Bank Maur landed the Group 2 Alister Clark Stakes in Australia in 2023. Maurice's progeny won over 100 races in JRA for the past two years in a row.

He was ranked seventh on the Japanese Leading Sire list in 2023.

He was ranked fourth on the Japanese Leading Two-Year-Old Sire list in 2023.
